message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this great product. I think it would be incredibly useful for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value I place on it, I understand your budget constraints.  Could you meet me at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.
